query.name: net.cdolinc.user.employment.employmentList
query.sql: SELECT u_cdol_user_employment.id, u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid, u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid, CASE WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = 0 THEN 'Diocean Office' WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = -1 THEN u_cdol_user_employment.school_name ELSE schools.name END AS schoolname, u_cdol_user_employment.assignment, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, FLOOR( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ) / 12 ) AS emp_years, FLOOR( MOD( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ), 12 ) ) AS emp_months, u_cdol_user_employment.epm_fte, u_cdol_user_employment.notes FROM u_cdol_user_employment LEFT JOIN schools ON schools.school_number = u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid WHERE u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0

query.name: net.cdolinc.user.employment.totalTime
query.description: Total Years and Months of Employment
query.sql: SELECT NVL(MAX(emp_end_date), SYSDATE) AS max_end_date, MIN(emp_start_date) AS min_start_date, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(MAX(emp_end_date), MIN(emp_start_date)) / 12) AS total_years, MOD(MONTHS_BETWEEN(MAX(emp_end_date), MIN(emp_start_date)), 12) AS total_months FROM u_cdol_user_employment WHERE (usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0) GROUP BY usersdcid
